channel.title: Pi Help with commands just need a code or two - no major problem
channel.description: Okay my pi server i want to make a code so when i teleport it takes money from the invent and if there isnt any it doesnt matter - to stop smuggling in dung any help??? i will put them on my rep list so when i get enough to rep i will :3

item.title: Pi Help with commands just need a code or two - no major problem
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

ZioBotic:

Yeah but it was a bit messy and too long because i posted multiple ones of them with likecaps and stuff. i also changed it later on so it is the proper teleport. can you make a pi dungeoneering guide??? for just the skill and the token shop pleeese i know your awesome at that stuff i will rep you???

His code was perfectly fine there is already a dung guide that i made and my friend re wrote and released for me you can use it as a base if you want.

Read full topic

i will rep you

item.title: Pi Help with commands just need a code or two - no major problem
item.dc:creator: @ZioBotic ZioBotic
item.description:
@ZioBotic wrote:

Legend vain, didnt use that code exactly i edited it and it works perfectly thanks! here it is if anyone wants it… if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("Dung")) { c.getPA().startTeleport(xxxx, yyyy, 0, "modern"); c.getItems().deleteItem(995, c.getItems().getItemSlot(995), c.getItems().getItemAmount(995)); }

Read full topic

item.title: Pi Help with commands just need a code or two - no major problem
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“ZioBotic, post:6, topic:403281”]Thanks but i need the code entirely that will take all the money they have - to stop smugging not a price to pay for teleporting there… These are the codes

if (playerCommand.equals("home")) { c.getPA().startTeleport(3037, 4832, 0, "modern"); } [/quote]

if (playerCommand.equals("home")) { c.getPA().startTeleport(3037, 4832, 0, "modern"); c.deleteitem(995, 214700000); }

??
